prediction.health: You will maintain perfect health throughout the day. Your courageous and determined nature will keep you in fine shape. Today is a great day to start new fitness regime.

prediction.luck: Luck will open new doors for you. You will be able to achieve great things by your small efforts.
prediction.personal_life: The day is perfect to take your relationship to a new height. Single persons may meet someone new who is likely to play an important role in the future. Be sure to spend quality time with your loved ones.

prediction.health: You shall enjoy good health. There shall be no physical ailments. Despite a hectic day you will still be able to retain your high energy levels.

prediction.health: Persons suffering from blood pressure and diabetes should be careful today about their health today. Take precautions against allergies and viral infections. Try to keep your stress level low. Activities such as yoga and meditation would help you.

prediction.personal_life: Your own people are likely to obstruct your work. Beware of secret enemies. Today, you are likely to be troubled with confrontations at work and home. Success, in matters of love, will be delayed. Romantic moves will not pay.

prediction.health: On the health front, there may be a minor digestive disorder, but rest assured it will be nothing serious.

prediction.health: A positive frame of mind will also help you keep diseases away. Take care to stay away from dust. Take all care while working, as you are susceptible to injuries today. Be on guard against minor injuries and ailments.
